Class CorruptPacketsCommandAction

  • public class CorruptPacketsCommandAction
extends TCCommandAction
    Corrupt network packets on a random regionserver.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CorruptPacketsCommandAction

        public CorruptPacketsCommandAction(float ratio,
                                   long duration,
                                   long timeout,
                                   String network)
        Corrupt network packets on a random regionserver.
        Parameters:
        ratio - the ratio of packets corrupted
        duration - the time this issue persists in milliseconds
        timeout - the timeout for executing required commands on the region server in milliseconds
        network - network interface the regionserver uses for communication
